scope.goal: ThemeForest-grade multi-platform Select/Dropdown dataset for AI retrieval + deterministic builders
notes: Select is critical for ERP (filters, forms, tables). Supports async loading, search, multi-select, grouped options, and virtualized lists.
Style-engine agnostic: use tokens + adapters for web/mobile/desktop.

component.name: Select
component.description: Select control with trigger + menu list; supports single/multi select, search, grouped options, async loading, and clear.

endIcon.description: Usually chevron; auto flipped in RTL.

footer.description: Optional footer actions inside menu (e.g., 'Add new').

requirements: Prefer visible label; if absent provide ariaLabel.
Use role='combobox' and aria-expanded, aria-controls, aria-activedescendant (web).
Keyboard: Enter/Space open, Arrow keys navigate, Esc close, type-to-search (when searchable).
Announce selected option changes to screen readers; ensure focus management between trigger and menu.
RTL: chevron direction auto flips; menu alignment respects direction.

implementationNotes: Use portal for menu; manage scroll/position; consider virtualization for >200 items.

mobile.preferred: native picker or bottom sheet combobox
implementationNotes: For searchable lists, use modal/bottom sheet with search input.

desktop.preferred: web pattern + keyboard shortcuts at app layer
implementationNotes: Support type-ahead and fast filtering; ensure menu stays within window bounds.
